knimeNode.name: Dat Download
knimeNode.shortDescription: Permits downloading of Mascot DAT files via a JAX-WS web service and will load each dat file into the output table as per the mascot reader. The node also saves the DAT files to the user-specified folder.

fullDescription.intro: Permits downloading of Mascot (www.matrixscience.com) DAT files via a JAX-WS web service and will load each dat file into the output table as per the mascot reader. The node also saves the DAT files to the user-specified folder.
fullDescription.option: Where the mascot dat file service is located. Press the refresh button to ensure the latest data is available.

Display the servers dat files since the chosen date. Options are:
Last 24 hours. Only searches submitted in the past day will be shown
Last 7 days
Current month. Since the start of the current month.
Current year. Since the start of the current year.
Since the dawn of time. Since a large amount of files will be listed, this may take considerable time to update. Be patient.
When the current date is changed, an automatic refresh of the list is performed.
Select those dat files which you want to download and process.
the second tab contains the same options as per the Mascot DAT file reader node. Please refer to that documentation for a more detailed description
